title: Anorexics and Bulimics Anonymous: The Fellowship Details Its Program of Recovery for Anorexia and Bulimia
description: A faith based 12 Step program...Directed toward those trapped in the labyrinth of eating disorders, their families, and their therapists, the text lays out in detail the steps taken, the tools used, the love that grew and the healing received.Illustrated with true-life experience and complete with a compilation of personal stories by individual members.
author: Anorexics and Bulimics Anonymous
